# Residuals histogram

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot()+
  geom_histogram(aes(champion$residuals, fill = "Champion"), alpha = 0.4, binwidth = 0.08)+
  geom_histogram(aes(challenger$residuals, fill = "Challenger"), alpha = 0.4, binwidth = 0.08)+
  geom_histogram(aes(0, fill = "Common"), alpha = 0, binwidth = 0.08)+
  scale_fill_manual(name = "", values = c("Champion" = "red", "Challenger" = "blue", "Common" = "purple"), 
                    labels = c(challenger$label, champion$label, "Common"))+
  labs(x = "residuals", y = "observations")+
  theme_drwhy()
```
